name: Quart
html:
The Quart integration adds support for the Quart Web Framework. We support Quart versions 0.16.1 and higher.

A Python version of 3.7 or higher is also required.

  1. Install sentry-sdk from PyPI:

    $ pip install --upgrade sentry-sdk

  2. To configure the SDK, initialize it with the integration before or after your app has been initialized:

    import sentry_sdk
from sentry_sdk.integrations.quart import QuartIntegration
from quart import Quart

sentry_sdk.init(
  dsn="___PUBLIC_DSN___",
  integrations=[
     QuartIntegration(),
  ],
  # Set traces_sample_rate to 1.0 to capture 100%
  # of transactions for performance monitoring.
  # We recommend adjusting this value in production,
  traces_sample_rate=1.0,
)

app = Quart(__name__)
